     314             : /**
     315             :  * RAII helper-class to override an event's message (i.e. its DOM-exposed
     316             :  * type), for as long as the object is alive.  Restores the original
     317             :  * EventMessage when destructed.
     318             :  *
     319             :  * Notable requirements:
     320             :  *  - The original & overriding messages must be known (not eUnidentifiedEvent).
     321             :  *  - The original & overriding messages must be different.
     322             :  *  - The passed-in nsIDOMEvent must outlive this RAII helper.
     323             :  */

     332             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aOverridingMessage != mOrigMessage,
     333             :                "Don't use this class if you're not actually overriding");
     334             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aOverridingMessage != eUnidentifiedEvent,
     335             :                "Only use this class with a valid overriding EventMessage");
